title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: I expect that when I try to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item is selected.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select an item. Ensure that it is the first time you are trying to select the item.
